name: mi24-bootstrap
description: The basics for usage of twitter bootstrap in ui project of movingimage24.

scripts.build:css: npm run build:css-bootstrap && npm run build:css-theme
scripts.build:css-bootstrap: lessc --autoprefix='last 2 versions,ie 9' less/mi24-bootstrap.less dist/css/mi24-bootstrap.css && cleancss --source-map -o dist/css/mi24-bootstrap.min.css dist/css/mi24-bootstrap.css
scripts.build:css-theme: lessc --autoprefix='last 2 versions,ie 9' less/mi24-theme.less dist/css/mi24-theme.css && cleancss --source-map -o dist/css/mi24-theme.min.css dist/css/mi24-theme.css
